content:
@Ewout Kramer what's your take on this?

https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.core/issues/335

My take is that the validator is correct: you cannot profile a canonical(StructureDefinition) to a canonical(Encounter)
You should not be able to do so. It's a bug in our validator that it does not catch this - I'll add an issue to our validator.
